document_data.mainbody: ''chef's toque''' was a variety of hat in the Realms that was commonly worn by chefs, often as part of an ensemble outfit called a "chef's whites."
document_data.Description: These hats were white in coloration.

Notable Wearers.Groups: * The [[kobold]] chefs of [[Xanathar]] wore such hats.
Notable Wearers.Individuals:
* [[Norver]]
* [[Gorstaf]], a [[duergar]] piemaker from [[Gracklstugh]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
* [[Jandar Chergoba]], head chef of the [[Cassalanter]] family's villa.
* [[Zastreva]], a cook in the [[Water Queen's House]] in [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], wore a chef's toque.
Notable Wearers.Regions & Settlements:
* Across the [[Sword Coast]] these hats were typically worn by only the finest of chefs.
* Chef's toques were worn by cooks of the [[Palace of Manniccis]] in [[Sumbria]], a city-state of the [[Blade Kingdoms]].

document_data.Reputation: A chef's toque was widely considered in the Sword Coast to be a great status symbol for chefs.
